name: Forest Visitor
description:
In desolate forest cold and Wolfs aren't the only threat! WARNING: Loud noises and screams.

[E - pick up] (You can use only one hand).

[Q - drop] (Drop logs near STAMPS (TREE REMAINS) to place them and then cut).

[WASD - Move]

Hi I am 18yo Ukrainian solo game developer, and this is my first thing that I ever got done. All the coding is done by me, assets are taken from asset store and are completely free. I really do hope that you enjoy my creation. Please, leave fair opinion on my game so I can improve my skills. Donations are wellcome, they will support me a lot. Thank you ;)
